author: Berrus_Brickus
title: Put an End to the Friends!
review:
This is my first review and it definitly won't be positive.  I got it for Christmas years ago in a pack that also included: LOCO, Creator, Alpha Team, LEGOLand, and Chess.  Anyway onto the review.
 
Building Experience/Parts
I gave this a one because it doesn't have anyting to do with LEGOs except the title.
 
Playability
Not really much to do.  You can but together a scrap book, write an annoying song, make a girl dance, and design a stage.
 
Value For Money
I am not going to complain here because, as I said, I got it free for christmas and the other games in the set weren't so bad.  But I still don't think that you should track it down and waste your money on it as you will be disappointed.
 
Pros and Cons

Pros
*Nice that they tried a game for girls (even if they are six)
*The other games in the pack weren't so bad (for the time)
 
 

Cons
*Pretty much everything
